quote: The gem cannot be polished without friction, nor man perfected without trials.
author: Chinese Proverb

quote: Success is to be measured not so much by the position that one has reached in life as by the obstacles which he has overcome.
author: Booker T. Washington

quote: Adversity has the effect of eliciting talents which, in prosperous circumstances, would have lain dormant.
author: Horace

quote: You may encounter many defeats, but you must not be defeated. In fact, it may be necessary to encounter the defeats so you can know who you are.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: The wound is the place where the Light enters you.
author: Rumi

quote: Strength does not come from physical capacity. It comes from an indomitable will.
author: Mahatma Gandhi

quote: The oak fought the wind and was broken; the willow bent when it must and survived.
author: Robert Jordan

quote: Fall seven times, stand up eight.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what the storm is all about.
author: Haruki Murakami

quote: It is not the mountain we conquer, but ourselves.
author: Sir Edmund Hillary

quote: The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: Smooth seas do not make skillful sailors.
author: African Proverb

quote: You have power over your mind—not outside events. Realize this, and you will find strength.
author: Marcus Aurelius

quote: When we are no longer able to change a situation, we are challenged to change ourselves.
author: Viktor Frankl

quote: The lotus blooms most beautifully from the deepest mud.
author: Buddhist Proverb

quote: Courage is resistance to fear, mastery of fear—not absence of fear.
author: Mark Twain

quote: The journey of a thousand miles begins with one step.
author: Lao Tzu

quote: Let me not pray to be sheltered from dangers, but to be fearless in facing them.
author: Rabindranath Tagore

quote: If the wind will not serve, take to the oars.
author: Latin Proverb

quote: The human spirit is stronger than anything that can happen to it.
author: C.C. Scott

quote: A ship is safe in harbor, but that’s not what ships are for.
author: John A. Shedd

quote: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
author: Thomas Paine

quote: Perseverance is not a long race; it is many short races one after the other.
author: Walter Elliot

quote: The brick walls are there for a reason. They’re not there to keep us out. The brick walls are there to give us a chance to show how badly we want something.
author: Randy Pausch

quote: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
author: Confucius

quote: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
author: Oprah Winfrey

quote: No one saves us but ourselves. No one can and no one may. We ourselves must walk the path.
author: Buddha

quote: He who has a why to live can bear almost any how.
author: Friedrich Nietzsche

quote: The world breaks everyone, and afterward, some are strong at the broken places.
author: Ernest Hemingway

quote: The only way out is through.
author: Robert Frost

quote: When everything seems to be going against you, remember that the airplane takes off against the wind, not with it.
author: Henry Ford

quote: Tough times never last, but tough people do.
author: Robert H. Schuller

quote: You gain strength, courage, and confidence by every experience in which you really stop to look fear in the face.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Stars cannot shine without darkness.
author: D.H. Sidebottom

quote: A hero is an ordinary individual who finds the strength to persevere and endure in spite of overwhelming obstacles.
author: Christopher Reeve

quote: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: You can’t fall if you don’t climb. But there’s no joy in living your whole life on the ground.
author: Anonymous

quote: The best way out is always through.
author: Helen Keller

quote: It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
author: Confucius

quote: I can be changed by what happens to me. But I refuse to be reduced by it.
author: Maya Angelou

quote: What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The phoenix must burn to emerge.
author: Janet Fitch

quote: If you’re going through hell, keep going.
author: Winston Churchill

quote: Rock bottom became the solid foundation on which I rebuilt my life.
author: J.K. Rowling

quote: The moment we give up is the moment we let someone else win.
author: Kobe Bryant

quote: Even the darkest night will end and the sun will rise.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: The difference between a stumbling block and a stepping stone is how high you raise your foot.
author: Benny Lewis

quote: We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The pain you feel today is the strength you feel tomorrow.
author: Arnold Schwarzenegger

quote: A river cuts through rock not because of its power, but because of its persistence.
author: Jim Watkins

quote: You were given this life because you are strong enough to live it.
author: Native American Proverb

quote: If you can’t fly then run, if you can’t run then walk, if you can’t walk then crawl, but whatever you do you have to keep moving forward.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
author: Charles Kingsleigh (Alice in Wonderland)

quote: When one door of happiness closes, another opens; but often we look so long at the closed door that we do not see the one which has been opened for us.
author: Helen Keller

quote: We are all in the gutter, but some of us are looking at the stars.
author: Oscar Wilde

quote: You must do the thing you think you cannot do.
author: Eleanor Roosevelt

quote: Life is 10% what happens to me and 90% how I react to it.
author: Charles R. Swindoll

quote: You may have to fight a battle more than once to win it.
author: Margaret Thatcher

quote: A smooth sea never made a skilled sailor.
author: Franklin D. Roosevelt

quote: The only thing that overcomes hard luck is hard work.
author: Harry Golden

quote: A man is not finished when he’s defeated. He’s finished when he quits.
author: Richard Nixon

quote: The soul that is within me no man can degrade.
author: Frederick Douglass

quote: The bamboo that bends is stronger than the oak that resists.
author: Japanese Proverb

quote: There is no education like adversity.
author: Benjamin Disraeli

quote: The strongest people are not those who show strength in front of us but those who win battles we know nothing about.
author: Anonymous

quote: You never know how strong you are until being strong is your only choice.
author: Bob Marley

quote: Do not judge me by my success, judge me by how many times I fell down and got back up again.
author: Nelson Mandela

quote: The greatest test of courage on earth is to bear defeat without losing heart.
author: Robert Green Ingersoll

quote: I am not what happened to me, I am what I choose to become.
author: Carl Jung

quote: It’s not whether you get knocked down, it’s whether you get up.
author: Vince Lombardi

quote: The struggle you’re in today is developing the strength you need tomorrow.
author: Robert Tew

quote: If you find a path with no obstacles, it probably doesn’t lead anywhere.
author: Frank A. Clark

quote: The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.
author: Confucius

quote: Perseverance, secret of all triumphs.
author: Victor Hugo

quote: I am not afraid of storms, for I am learning how to sail my ship.
author: Louisa May Alcott

quote: The only disability in life is a bad attitude.
author: Scott Hamilton

quote: You can’t go back and change the beginning, but you can start where you are and change the ending.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.
author: Babe Ruth

quote: The only thing standing between you and your goal is the story you keep telling yourself that you can’t achieve it.
author: Jordan Belfort

quote: You don’t drown by falling in the water; you drown by staying there.
author: Ed Cole

quote: Resilience is knowing that you are the only one that has the power and the responsibility to pick yourself up.
author: Mary Holloway

quote: The ones who are crazy enough to think they can change the world are the ones who do.
author: Steve Jobs

quote: The secret of life is to fall seven times and to get up eight times.
author: Paulo Coelho

quote: Hope is being able to see that there is light despite all of the darkness.
author: Desmond Tutu

quote: The difference between the impossible and the possible lies in a person’s determination.
author: Tommy Lasorda

quote: The sun himself is weak when he first rises, and gathers strength and courage as the day gets on.
author: Charles Dickens

quote: A champion is defined not by their wins but by how they can recover when they fall.
author: Serena Williams

quote: The moment you’re ready to quit is usually the moment right before a miracle happens.
author: Anonymous

quote: The flower that blooms in adversity is the rarest and most beautiful of all.
author: Walt Disney Company (Mulan)

quote: It’s not the load that breaks you down, it’s the way you carry it.
author: Lou Holtz

quote: Failure is only the opportunity to begin again more intelligently.
author: Henry Ford

quote: We acquire the strength we have overcome.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: You have within you right now, everything you need to deal with whatever the world can throw at you.
author: Brian Tracy

quote: No one is immune from adversity. The difference is how we respond to it.
author: Arianna Huffington

quote: The path from dreams to success does exist. May you have the vision to find it, the courage to get on to it, and the perseverance to follow it.
author: Kalpana Chawla

quote: The best way to not feel hopeless is to get up and do something. Don’t wait for good things to happen to you. If you go out and make some good things happen, you will fill the world with hope, you will fill yourself with hope.
author: Barack Obama

quote: The human capacity for burden is like bamboo—far more flexible than you’d ever believe at first glance.
author: Jodi Picoult

quote: The greatest weapon against stress is our ability to choose one thought over another.
author: William James

quote: Never give up on a dream just because of the time it will take to accomplish it. The time will pass anyway.
author: Earl Nightingale

quote: Do not pray for easy lives. Pray to be stronger men.
author: John F. Kennedy

quote: A problem is a chance for you to do your best.
author: Duke Ellington

quote: The greatest oak was once a little nut who held its ground.
author: Anonymous

quote: You cannot swim for new horizons until you have courage to lose sight of the shore.
author: William Faulkner

quote: It is during our darkest moments that we must focus to see the light.
author: Aristotle

quote: If I cannot do great things, I can do small things in a great way.
author: Martin Luther King Jr.

quote: The harder you fall, the higher you bounce.
author: Unknown

quote: We must embrace pain and burn it as fuel for our journey.
author: Kenji Miyazawa

quote: You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
author: C.S. Lewis

quote: Tough times don’t last. Tough people do.
author: Gregory Peck

quote: The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: The strongest hearts have the most scars.
author: Anonymous

quote: Never let your head hang down. Never give up and sit down and grieve. Find another way.
author: Satchel Paige

quote: I am not a product of my circumstances. I am a product of my decisions.
author: Stephen Covey
